verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the blessing and the curse, which I have set before thee, and thou shalt call them to mind among all the nations, whither the LORD thy God hath driven thee,
verses.ct: When all of these things have happened to you — both the blessing and the curse that I have laid out before you — and you reflect on them while living among all the nations where the LORD your God has scattered you,

verses.kjv: And shalt return unto the LORD thy God, and shalt obey his voice according to all that I command thee this day, thou and thy children, with all thine heart, and with all thy soul;
verses.ct: and when you come back to the LORD your God and follow what he says, doing everything I am commanding you today — you and your children — with your whole heart and your whole soul,

verses.kjv: That then the LORD thy God will turn thy captivity, and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations, whither the LORD thy God hath scattered thee.
verses.ct: then the LORD your God will restore your fortunes and show you compassion. He will come back and gather you from all the nations where the LORD your God has scattered you.

verses.kjv: If any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the LORD thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:
verses.ct: Even if your people have been driven to the most distant places under the heavens, the LORD your God will gather you from there and bring you back.

verses.kjv: And the LORD thy God will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed, and thou shalt possess it; and he will do thee good, and multiply thee above thy fathers.
verses.ct: The LORD your God will bring you into the land that your ancestors owned, and you will take possession of it. He will cause you to prosper and increase your numbers beyond what your ancestors ever were.

verses.kjv: And the LORD thy God will circumcise thine heart, and the heart of thy seed, to love the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, that thou mayest live.
verses.ct: The LORD your God will transform your heart and the hearts of your descendants so that you love the LORD your God with your whole heart and your whole soul, and so that you will truly live.

verses.kjv: And the LORD thy God will put all these curses upon thine enemies, and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee.
verses.ct: The LORD your God will place all of these curses on your enemies and on those who hated and persecuted you.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt return and obey the voice of the LORD, and do all his commandments which I command thee this day.
verses.ct: Then you will once again follow what the LORD says and carry out all his commands that I am giving you today.

verses.kjv: And the LORD thy God will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy cattle, and in the fruit of thy land, for good: for the LORD will again rejoice over thee for good, as he rejoiced over thy fathers:
verses.ct: The LORD your God will give you abundance in everything you do — in the children you have, in the offspring of your livestock, and in the produce of your land. The LORD will once again take delight in making you prosper, just as he took delight in your ancestors,

verses.kjv: If thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which are written in this book of the law, and if thou turn unto the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
verses.ct: as long as you listen to the LORD your God and keep his commands and regulations that are written in this book of the law, and as long as you turn back to the LORD your God with your whole heart and your whole soul.

verses.kjv: For this commandment which I command thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off.
verses.ct: What I am commanding you today is not too difficult for you to understand, and it is not out of your reach.

verses.kjv: It is not in heaven, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go up for us to heaven, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
verses.ct: It is not up in heaven, so that you would need to ask, 'Who will go up to heaven for us, bring it down, and let us hear it so we can follow it?'

verses.kjv: Neither is it beyond the sea, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
verses.ct: And it is not across the ocean, so that you would need to ask, 'Who will cross the ocean for us, bring it back, and let us hear it so we can follow it?'

verses.kjv: But the word is very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth, and in thy heart, that thou mayest do it.
verses.ct: No — the word is very near to you. It is already on your lips and in your heart, ready for you to put into practice.

verses.kjv: See, I have set before thee this day life and good, and death and evil;
verses.ct: Look, today I have placed before you life and what is good, and death and what is evil.

verses.kjv: In that I command thee this day to love the LORD thy God, to walk in his ways, and to keep his commandments and his statutes and his judgments, that thou mayest live and multiply: and the LORD thy God shall bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it.
verses.ct: What I am commanding you today is to love the LORD your God, to follow his ways, and to keep his commands, regulations, and laws. Then you will live and grow in number, and the LORD your God will bless you in the land you are entering to take possession of.

verses.kjv: But if thine heart turn away, so that thou wilt not hear, but shalt be drawn away, and worship other gods, and serve them;
verses.ct: But if your heart turns away and you refuse to listen, and you are lured into bowing down to other gods and serving them,

verses.kjv: I denounce unto you this day, that ye shall surely perish, and that ye shall not prolong your days upon the land, whither thou passest over Jordan to go to possess it.
verses.ct: I am warning you today that you will certainly be destroyed. You will not live long in the land you are crossing the Jordan to enter and possess.

verses.kjv: I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live:
verses.ct: I am calling heaven and earth as witnesses against you today: I have placed before you life and death, blessing and cursing. So choose life, so that you and your descendants may live.

verses.kjv: That thou mayest love the LORD thy God, and that thou mayest obey his voice, and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he is thy life, and the length of thy days: that thou mayest dwell in the land which the LORD sware unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give them.
verses.ct: Love the LORD your God, listen to what he says, and hold tightly to him — because he is your life and the source of a long life for you — so that you may live in the land that the LORD promised to your ancestors Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob.
